replies.body:
I'll try my best to clear this up.

 + **Scripts**
**Riot** has released very little information on script detection. That way hackers have very little information to try and reverse engineer their way around the system.

 All we know is that serious scripters are [banned in waves](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AEVP3NMA-anti-cheater-banwave-incoming) for security reasons. This is likely why this player hasn't been banned yet. 

+ **Instant Feedback**
 Theoretically, someone could be [perma-banned instantly](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-#h1q4) by the instant feedback system if their behavior was serious enough. It really depends on how toxic they are, and whether people report them.

As for being banned by video; **Riot** is not likely to punish a player using solely a video, but it might prompt an in-depth investigation, that could end with some form of punishment. This happened with players such as **Tyler1** himself and **XJ9**, who now have special indefinite bans.

I hope this helps :)
